decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered. Noise and Waste Management Plans received on 17/11/2014. Email from Esther Worboys with additional information dated 16/1/2014. Cover Letter dated 03/02/2015. Location Plan received on 04/02/2015. Existing layout and Proposed Layout received on 28/04/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for a Street Market of up to 18 stalls shall not be carried on outside the following times 9am to 6pm on up to five days per week, except on up to 20 days per year when extended hours from 9am to 8pm would be permitted for special events.
Condition : 4 - No vehicles shall access the site for set up or take down of the market stalls or deliveries between 9am-5.30pm
description: Layout and operation of a street market, providing up to 18 stalls trading no more than five days per week (amended layout)
